name: Dead Box
description:
The game is still under update, this version has been published to see your comments. You have to help the player to get out of the room and you can do that by killing the player to create a floor.

Controller:

  • Left, Right arrows to move the player
  • Press Z to Jump
  • Press X to kill your player
